title: ServiceFabric.PubSubActors
description: ServiceFabric.PubSubActors adds pub/sub behaviour to your Reliable Actors and Services in Service Fabric. How to use this package: https://github.com/loekd/ServiceFabric.PubSubActors/blob/master/README.md
summary: Lets 'Publisher' Actors & Services publish messages to 'Subscriber' Actors & Services, without the need to have references to those Subscriber Actors & Services.
